thread.section_title: W New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good service. Little attention to detail to be excellent.
thread.title_full: Good service. Little attention to detail to be excellent. - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jas S
title: Good service. Little attention to detail to be excellent.
text:
Went to NY for wife's 30th Birthday between 9th and 13th March.
*Check in was nice and easy
*Went to our room and was disappointed that the room did not match the photos online, so the receptionist kindly upgraded us to a room on the 16th floor with amazing views. On top of that we got complimentary cheesecake and cookies for a happy birthday gift for my wife.
*The only downside about the Hotel I would say is the cleanliness of the room, dusty lamp shades, cupboards and vents.
I would like to say a special mention to Teddy and Jason who are the hotel concierges. These two helped me lot, they showed us local places in NY to eat and shop. Also sorted out all my transfers to the airport. So if you visiting the W keep out for these two. Thanks Guys :)
